column8: Situated within the elegant Antico Borgo di Sutri resort in the heart of the verdant countryside around Viterbo, this restaurant boasts an intimate and contemporary ambience, with soft lighting and large picture windows offering views of the surrounding greenery. Here, young, talented chef Simone Lezzereni serves regionally influenced cuisine, including reinterpreted traditional recipes with a focus on top-quality local ingredients and modern techniques.
